A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Well\, that's that.  I can understand why fans hate this movie.  Leia in space\, give me a break!  

RJ did a great job in running two years of anticipation with the initial scene with Luke & Rey.  The OJ Simpsonesque chase through space was tedious at best.  

The only good thing I can say is that at least there will be no anticipation for the next one.
